resources.string: You must accept all terms and conditions!
Sign in with Google is not yet available.
Login to your Synapse account now.
Join the Synapse community by creating your account now üòä
Now finish account creation by completing your profile or skip profile completion step using skip button.
Profile photo, username, nickname and bio that appear on your profile.
By specifying your gender in your profile, you can get other people to know you and you can be recommended to people who use filters, thus increasing your interaction.
I do not want to specify

You are about to cancel the profile completion phase! If you leave this stage, your e-mail account will be kept, then you will be redirected to this page by logging in instead of creating an account. If you want, you can remove your e-mail from our server.
Are you sure you want to cancel the profile completion phase?
Verify the email account linked to your account now. If you continue without verifying your e-mail account, you can only preview the content of the application and will not be able to interact.

Verification link has been successfully sent to your e-mail address! Confirm your e-mail address by clicking the incoming link, then check it by clicking the refresh button. If you can‚Äôt find the email link, check the spam folder.
Username can be at least 3 characters
Username can be up to 25 characters
Username must contain at least one letter
This username has already been taken
Nickname can be up to 30 characters
Biography can be up to 250 characters

You are about to cancel account creation! If you cancel this action, your e-mail information will be removed from our server. Therefore, when you log in again later, you will need to register on the new account creation page and reconfirm your email.
Are you sure you want to cancel account creation?
The profile photo you selected appears as an unsupported file type! Please choose "png" or "jpg" type image.
The text post can have a maximum of 500 characters long.
‚Ä¢ You have no or weak internet connection.
‚Ä¢ The application may be under maintenance.
‚Ä¢ There may be technical problems on our side.
No user found with this username :(
This comment was liked by the publisher
We are sad! An error has occurred in the application, please report this error to us. We will try to fix it.
Are you sure you want to follow this user?
Are you sure you want to unfollow this user?
You don‚Äôt have anyone to chat with yet
This user hasn‚Äôt shared a post yet

Only you will be able to see this post.
Users won\'t be able to save this post to their favorites.
No one will be able to comment on this post.
Add a bio to let others know more about you
There are no global posts yet.
There are no local posts yet.
The people you follow haven‚Äôt published any posts yet.
You don‚Äôt have any favorite posts yet.
Please update the app to access the app and enjoy all the new features.
The app is temporarily under maintenance! please try again later.
Recently, we observed that you have been doing activities against our community guidelines on your account, and as a result, we have blocked your account.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this message? Both users will be permanently deleted.
By setting the region, you can show your country‚Äôs flag badge in your full profile and activate local posts filtered by the country you choose.
Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
You can manage all your previously added profile photos here.
There is no profile photo you have previously uploaded! Every time you change your profile photo it is added here.
You can manage all your previously added cover photos here.
There is no cover photo you have previously uploaded! Every time you change your cover photo it is added here.
This user does not follow anyone
Your user profile could not be loaded. This might indicate an issue with your account or a database problem.
For more privacy and storage, new messages will disappear from this chat for everyone after the selected duration except when kept. Anyone in the chat can change this setting. Learn more
You can\'t reply to this conversation. Learn more.
I confirm that I\'m at least 12 years of age.
You are a text summarizer. Provide a concise summary of the given text.
You are a helpful assistant. Explain the following text in a clear and detailed manner, using Markdown for formatting (headings, bold, etc.).
Here is a part of a chat conversation between Me and %1$s: --- %2$s --- Please explain the following message from %3$s in detail, considering the context of the conversation: %4$s --- %5$s ---
Adjusting this font size doesn\'t effects the whole app.
This doesn\'t affect other UI corners\' radius
Theme changes the whole apps overall interface, colours, fonts, and images as well
Tap near the edge of the screen while viewing media to navigate
Switch sound to the earpiece by raising the phone to your ear
Pause music when you start recording a video message
This data has been recorded since\nlast month
This message will only be removed from your device. Other participants will still see it.
This message will be removed for all participants in this conversation. This action cannot be undone.
Failed to delete message. Please try again.
Unable to reply to this message
Failed to forward message. Please try again.
You don\'t have permission to send messages in %1$s
No network connection. Message will be forwarded when online.
Unable to edit message. Please try again.
This message is too old to edit (>48 hours)
Edit queued. Will be applied when online.
Failed to delete message. Please try again.
Unable to delete for everyone. Message may have already been deleted.
Delete queued. Will be applied when online.
Unable to generate summary. Please try again.
Rate limit reached. Try again in %1$d minutes
Message is too short to summarize
Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
Request timed out. Please try again.
AI service not configured. Please contact support.
Request timed out. Please try again.
Connection failed. Please check your internet connection.
Action queued. Will be processed when online.

A new report will be created every month.
Create a report of your channel updates and channel settings.
A new report will be created every month.
